row.Name: Initial Title
row.Description: The first title a question is asked with.

row.Name: Initial Body
row.Description: The first raw body text a post is submitted with.

row.Name: Initial Tags
row.Description: The first tags a question is asked with.

row.Name: Edit Title
row.Description: A question's title has been changed.

row.Name: Edit Body
row.Description: A post's body has been changed - the raw text is stored here.

row.Name: Edit Tags
row.Description: A question's tags have been changed.

row.Name: Rollback Title
row.Description: A question's title has reverted to a previous version.

row.Name: Rollback Body
row.Description: A post's body has reverted to a previous version - the raw text is stored here.

row.Name: Rollback Tags
row.Description: A question's tags have reverted to a previous version.

row.Name: Post Closed
row.Description: A post was voted to be closed.

row.Name: Post Reopened
row.Description: A post was voted to be reopened.

row.Name: Post Deleted
row.Description: A post was voted to be removed.

row.Name: Post Undeleted
row.Description: A post was voted to be restored.

row.Name: Post Locked
row.Description: A post was locked by a moderator.

row.Name: Post Unlocked
row.Description: A post was unlocked by a moderator.

row.Name: Community Owned
row.Description: A post has become community owned.

row.Name: Question Merged
row.Description: A question has had another, deleted question merged into itself.
